quote: New day, new hopes, new life!!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Old words are reborn with new faces.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: This is a new year. A new beginning. And things will change.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: ...inside every old person is a young person wondering what happened.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Moving Pictures

quote: Daring to make a difference in today's youth-one page at a time
author: william sawyers

quote: New Age values are conscious evolution, a non-sectarian society, a non-military culture, global sharing, healing the environment, sustainable economies, self-determination, social justice, economic empowerment of the poor, love, compassion in action, going beyond religious fundamentalism, going beyond nationalism-extreme nationalism, culture.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: the difference between the old and the new education being) in a word, the old was a kind of propagation - men transmitting manhood to men; the new is merely propaganda.
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Abolition of Man

quote: To learn something new, take the path that you took yesterday.
author: John Burroughs

quote: The only thing new in the world is the history you do not know.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: We are now on the threshold of a newer movement, with a newer hope and a new inspiration.
author: James Larkin

quote: What we think, we become
author: Buddha

quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
author: Henri Bergson

quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.
author: John Cage

quote: We are born and reborn again and again. We are changing with the waves of time.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Begin to acquire knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A-New-Year's-a-Comin' [10w] A new year is coming!Let's all make new mistakes!
author: Beryl Dov

quote: It used to be about trying to do something. Now it's about trying to be someone.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: The new midlife is where you realize that even your failures make you more beautiful and are turned spiritually into success if you became a better person because of them. You became a more humble person. You became a more merciful and compassionate person.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: When Old Age Begins Old age seizes center stagewhen more people we love are amidst the deadthan amongst the living.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Your status has changed. Your Name is changed! You are a new creation.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: New Age Hype Don't 'honor your feelings.'Half the time they're full of shit.Don't 'embrace' anything without a pulse.Mindfulness should include not listening to quacks.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: As outsiders looking in, my readers and I must reform how we think so we may open ourselves to new forms of knowledge.
author: Cristina Marrero

quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Now comes the mystery! (last words)
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: We become the books we read.
author: Matthew Kelly

quote: Be an example and open a new way for life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If you want to be a new man you have to stay in new places, and do new things, with people who never knew you before. If you go back to the same old ways, what else can you be but the same old person?
author: Joe Abercrombie,  Last Argument of Kings

quote: A new day: Be open enough to see opportunities. Be wise enough to be grateful. Be courageous enough to be happy.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You become what you think about
author: Napoleon Hill,  Success Through A Positive Mental Attitude

quote: Today is not just another ordinary day. It is an opportunity to do, or say, something that just might inspire someone to greater becoming...especially a wayward youth.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: To stay young, accept the changes and continue to learn.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
author: Herman Melville

quote: I've been the oldest child since before you were born
author: E.L. Konigsburg,  From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler

quote: We are no longer in the dispensation of age and experience. We are in the era of knowledge and information. Information leads a true leader and a true leader leads others.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: New Year - a new chapter, new verse, or just the same old story ? Ultimately we write it. The choice is ours.
author: Alex Morritt,  Impromptu Scribe

quote: It's a funny old world.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: …is postmodernity the pastime of an old man who scrounges in the garbage-heap of finality looking for leftovers, who brandishes unconsciousnesses, lapses, limits, confines, goulags, parataxes, non-senses, or paradoxes, and who turns this into the glory of his novelty, into his promise of change?
author: Jean-François Lyotard

quote: I love everything that is old; old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wines.
author: Oliver Goldsmith,  The Vicar of Wakefield

quote: They say I'm old-fashioned, and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The religion of one age is the literary entertainment of the next.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: What one generation finds ridiculous, the next accepts; and the third shudders when it looks back on what the first did.
author: Peter Singer

quote: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: This is what youth must figure out:Girls, love, and living.The having, the not having,The spending and giving,And the meloncholy time of not knowing.This is what age must learn about:The ABC of dying.The going, yet not going,The loving and leaving,And the unbearable knowing and knowing
author: E.B. White

quote: No More Games. No More Bombs. No More Walking. No More Fun. No More Swimming. 67. That is 17 years past 50. 17 more than I needed or wanted. Boring. I am always bitchy. No Fun — for anybody. 67. You are getting Greedy. Act your old age. Relax — This won't hurt
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air,new lights and new truths to enter.
author: Amit Ray,  Walking the Path of Compassion
